answers.answer: Your nickname would suggest you will want to change your profile to read female rather than male.  Frequent urination can be caused by urinary tract infection or kidney dysfunction, so you'll want to get these things checked out.  It can also be caused if you are drinking a great deal, if you have diabetes insipidus, etc..  If no other explanation is found and you also are having bladder pain, you might get a urologist to check to see if you have interstitial cystitis- best way to diagnose this is with cystoscopy w/hydrodistension, done under anesthesia.Pain in lower left might be a kidney hurting, might be from tensing muscles with stressful day, might be from irritable bowel as well.  Also, do you still have your ovaries?Bloating can be from water retention, gas, ascites, etc.: protruding stomach can also be from weight gain- have you had unexplained weight gain?

question: I am having frequent urination, pertruding stomach, recently pain in lower left stomach after a stressful day at work. The pain is off and on. I need help with these syptoms.
title: Please help with syptoms
